    • getPrimitiveClass

      @Deprecated @NotNull public static @NotNull Class<?> getPrimitiveClass(@NotNull @NotNull String type) throws ClassNotFoundException, NullPointerException
      推奨されていません。
      Scheduled to be removed in 0.15. Please use util.magic.Magic.ForbiddenMagic#getPrimitiveClass(String) Magic.getForbiddenMagic().getPrimitiveClass(String)} instead.
      Return the Virtual Machine's Class object for the named primitive type. The result class is equivalent to <BoxedPrimitiveType>.TYPE.

      Remember: This is forbidden magic.

      戻り値:
      primitive class
      例外:
      ClassNotFoundException - when class was not found by specified type.
      NullPointerException - when null was provided to the type.

    • getPrimitiveClassSneaky

      @Deprecated @NotNull public static @NotNull Class<?> getPrimitiveClassSneaky(@NotNull @NotNull String type) throws NullPointerException
      推奨されていません。
      Scheduled to be removed in 0.15. Please use Magic.getForbiddenMagic().getPrimitiveClassSneaky(String) instead.
      Return the Virtual Machine's Class object for the named primitive type. The result class is equivalent to <BoxedPrimitiveType>.TYPE. This method is similar to getPrimitiveClass(String), but it throws RuntimeException instead of ClassNotFoundException when could not find the class.

      Remember: This is forbidden magic.

      戻り値:
      primitive class
      例外:
      RuntimeException - when class was not found by specified type.
      NullPointerException - when null was provided to the type.
